channel.title: How i decide what object raises a certain skill?
channel.description:
im using pre made source called ultimate pk
how do i decide what object raises a certain skill and much xp it gives

item.title: How i decide what object raises a certain skill?
item.dc:creator: @The_Old_Mage The Old Mage
item.description:
@The_Old_Mage wrote:

Right, there is certain numbers for different skills.

In character files.

[00] = attack
[01] = Defence
[02] = Strength
[03] = Hitpoints
[04] = Ranged
[05] = Prayer
[06] = Mage
Etc.

Your supposed to add what Zilchuary said into client.java.
Simple.
Adjust the exp by changing his 1000* to 100* etc,

Read full topic
item.source: How i decide what object raises a certain skill?

item.title: How i decide what object raises a certain skill?
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

lol non of you know how to do it =p

rightâ€¦
this is what you do
find the case in client.java

heres an example

case 10778: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You gain magic experience!"); < message they get actionTimer = 10; < timer for massers setAnimation(1833); < emote when training addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[6]), 6); addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[3]), 3); < meens what skills and how much xp updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

Read full topic
